author: OnlyLayer
title: OnlyLayer - Bridge
shortDescription: OnlyLayer Bridge application serves as a crucial link between Ethereum Layer 2 (L2) and Layer 1 (L1) networks, providing seamless interoperability.
description: Seamlessly links Ethereum Layer 2 to Layer 1, boosting scalability, cutting costs, and ensuring secure asset transfers with smart contracts. Enjoy the perks of Layer 2 scaling while staying connected to the Ethereum Sepolia.

author: OnlyLayer
title: OnlyLayer - Dex Testnet
shortDescription: DeX Swap Testnet is a cryptocurrency exchange platform on the blockchain testnet, allowing users to trade digital assets without intermediaries or central control.
description: DeX Swap Testnet is a cryptocurrency asset exchange platform operating in the blockchain testnet environment. It is a trial version of the DeX platform designed to enable users to exchange cryptocurrency assets without intermediaries or central authorities.
